reviewText: The Voices & Visions series is the best video documentary on poets and poetry that I have found. I watch the episodes again and again from time to time. They are endlessly fascinating, an intoxicating mix of biography, archival readings by the poets and/or actors reading the words of the poets, interviews with critics and/or living contemporaries, artistic visual interpretations of the poetry, and evocative recitations of the poems themselves.
